title: Unknown Font in Logo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724110344im_/http:/typophile.com/files/village-tieupgolf-logo_6193.jpg)

I need to change the dates in this logo and the previous artist at my shop converted the type to outlines and left no note on what the font was.

-I figured it out.

Font: 

 Ultra Violent BB (modified) 

Solved By: 

 [glytchdesign](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724110344/http:/typophile.com/user/218091 "View user profile.")
author: glytchdesign

comments.content:
Good work! That looks right to me too, but that'sa whole lotta compression.
